main.name: Hi I'm Albert!
main.description: I am an aspiring software engineer, currently a Year 2 Computer Science and Mathematics studying at National University of Singapore (NUS)
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.degree: B. Comp in Computer Science and Mathematics
education.description2: Recipient of NUS Undergraduate Merit Scholarship (ASEAN)

work.title: Teaching Assistant
work.description: I taught CS1010E Introduction to Programming in Python to a class of 20 freshmen. I learned how to explain programming concepts in an easy-to-understand way for those without programming background. This helped me enhance my communication ability to non-IT personnels and deepen my understanding of programming concepts.

work.title: Software Developer Intern
work.description: In this internship, I perfomed low-level development on RAK3172 to add Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) module in C++. I then prototyped

skills.name: Framework and Tools
skills.description: ReactJS, Kotlin (Android Studio), ExpressJS, NodeJS, Firebase, MongoDB, Git
